name: Out of Control(s) (Geegaz)
description:
Out of Control(s)

- By Geegaz -

Build your way with your own controls.

With your 3 controls (Left, Right, Jump) available at the bottom of the screen, you can drag them in the world to use them as platforms. But don't use too many, or you could run out of controls !

Because as soon an one is placed, you can't use it for movement. It will be locked until you retrieve the control from the world.

Due to the very short duration of the Jam, I did not have the time to create a bigger level. Sorry about that !
I will continue to update the Github repository with more content and bugfixes. Controls

The game plays with a mouse and keyboard.

  • Move: Left and Right arrow / A and D
  • Jump: Up arrow / Space
  • Place Control: Drag & drop from the bar
  • Retrieve Control: Click control in world or the empty slot in the bar
  • Pause / Quit: Escape
  • Fullscreen: F11
Credits

Made with Godot 3.2.1.
All design, code and graphics (fonts not included) by me.

  • Big font: Joystix Font by Raymond Larabie
  • Small font: BitPotion Font Family by JoebRogers
  • SFX: Platformer SFX by David Stearns
  • Music: 10-Bunker by Metre
